this_title: Dreamtown: A Brief Anatomy of Blackpool
introduction: A revealing and often ribald look at the seaside resort where people can let their hair down, whether in the sedate atmosphere of the Tower Ballroom or on the world's biggest and fastest rollercoaster. Actor David Thewlis returns to his home town, a place where beer is drunk and dreams are played out against the backdrop of a thoroughly British fantasy.
chinese_title: Dreamtown: A Brief Anatomy of Blackpool
